'''Where the Heart finds Rest''' ''(unofficial name)'' is a [[Quest Domain]] during [[Archon Quest]] [[Interlude Chapter]]: Act I - [[The Crane Returns on the Wind]] quest "[[Where the Heart Finds Rest]]."

In this domain, the player engages in a battle against [[Beisht]].
